claim: Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older
explanation: The image shows a product information excerpt for Flublok, including the National Drug Code (NDC) for the single-dose prefilled syringe, storage and handling instructions (e.g., refrigerate between 2° and 8 °C, do not freeze, protect from light), and the beginning of the patient counseling section. There is no mention in this excerpt of an approved age range—nothing indicates that Flublok is approved for adults 18 years and older. Therefore, this image does not provide evidence supporting the claim.
